content.title: ICAR Senior Research Fellowship For Post-Graduate Studies In Agricultural Sciences
content.department: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
content.beneficiary: Students pursuing Ph.D. in Agricultural Sciences
content.details: ICAR awards a certain number of Senior Research Fellowships for Ph.D. in an Agricultural University (AU), in different disciplines of agriculture and allied sciences. This is done to encourage talented students to undertake higher agricultural education. The ICAR supports specific time-bound schemes/projects to address the emerging challenges of agricultural research and education.
benefits: Veterinary Sciences: ₹ 12,000/- per month with a contingency grant of ₹ 6,000/- per annum.
All disciplines other than Veterinary Sciences: ₹ 8,640/- per month with a contingency grant of ₹ 6,000/- per annum.
eligibility: Candidates having completed their Master’s degree program with a minimum of 55% marks or an OGPA of 5.5/10.00 or equivalent.
Candidates appearing in the final semester would also be eligible provided they complete their postgraduate degree by the date of examination.
The upper age limit would be 30 years as of the date of the examination, with relaxations for SC/ST/PH and OBC categories.
exclusions: The ICAR-SRF (PGS) will NOT be available for admission in any university other than the Agricultural Universities (AUs).
content.application_process: Online application process involving registration, filling details, uploading documents, and payment of application fees.
documents_required: Three identical copies of the latest passport-size colored photographs
Copy of payment of application fee
Post-office receipt as postal dispatch proof of application
Address for communication, Mobile Number, email id, etc.
Bank Account details for payment of Fee

faqs.question: Does ICAR release the application forms for PhD courses?
faqs.answer: The National Testing Agency (NTA) conducted ICAR AICE and ICAR AIEEA on behalf of ICAR. Candidates had to visit the official website of ICAR-NTA to apply online.

faqs.question: What are different modes to apply for SRF(PhD)?
faqs.answer: Application Forms can only be submitted online mode on the website https://icar.nta.ac.in.

faqs.question: Can a person submit more than one application form for the exam?
faqs.answer: NO. Only ONE application is to be submitted by a candidate for appearing in the exam.

faqs.question: What documents or certificates do I need to upload along with the Application Form?
faqs.answer: Candidates need to upload scanned images of their photograph, signature and thumb impression, with the Application Form.

faqs.question: How can I pay Application Fee?
faqs.answer: Fee can be paid using SBI/Canara/HDFC/ICICI Bank Payment Gateway through Debit Card/Credit Card/Net Banking/UPI/Paytm.

faqs.question: If I have made any mistake(s) while registering/applying, can I make changes later in the Application Form?
faqs.answer: Once the ‘Final Submit’ button has been clicked, the candidate’s details cannot be edited/changed. However, NTA shall open the 'Correction Window' as per the schedule.
